credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Sampler
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Donor's Notes: Bought in Exeter, New Hampshire
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, chain, satin, eye, stem and speckling stitches on plain weave foundation; counted and uncounted stitches
description:
The field contains three alphabets, two ampersands, two sets of numerals and an inscription: 
Let virtue be a guide to thee Elmira Cressey aged 14 Born May 23 1812

With a wide border of floral sprigs on three sides, and at the bottom a scene with a house, a figure and a basket of fruit.
name: Sampler
